Hi all,

Unforunately I was hoping this copy would be a good verison, it is not.  While you can activate it, it eventually (for me 7 days) realizes IT IS NOT GENUINE.  

Now no biggie right?  Cuz you can get a patch to remove that annoyaning message.  But Windows  7 then slows your computer down and at times makes it in operatable.

Examples are Windows Explorer lagging, Internet ocassionally locks for 10 seconds, and cpu use can go to 20 percent of its max preformance.

Microsoft ran into too many issues with its previous plan to reboot Windows 7 non genuine every 2 to 4 hours.  Its changed now to use variable amount of CPU, Serial, Video, capacity.

Google yourself : Not Genuine Slow

here examples 
Help with 'Microsoft is not genuine' message?!! Now very Slow - Vista Forums

Im not yelling at the person who uploaded it, I thank people for contributing but just want to save your trouble before you run a billion malware virus scans trying to figure out the slowness
